message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8000 to us. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it could greatly benefit you. Let's discuss how we can reach an agreeable price for this exceptional item.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me your premium product. I appreciate the value it provides. I am willing to pay up to $6500 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product and appreciate your offer. Given the unique features and high quality of our premium product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $7000. This reflects a compromise between our initial price and your offer, aiming to find a mutually beneficial solution.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I've considered your proposal and am willing to pay $6800 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value and benefits of our premium product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $7200. This price aims to meet somewhere between our previous offers, ensuring both parties are satisfied.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've decided to increase my offer slightly to $6900. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while staying within my budget.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose a counteroffer of $7100. This price seeks to balance our interests and maintain a fair transaction.
I appreciate your effort in finding a middle ground, Alice. Based on my assessment and willingness to pay, I am now willing to offer $7050 for the product.

I see you're making a genuine effort to reach an agreement, Bob. In light of this, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $7080. This price aims to closely align with your latest offer while still reflecting the value of our premium product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $7075 for the product. I hope this final offer meets your needs and allows us to conclude this negotiation.
